title: [QUESTION] SKBlendMode.DstOver on Windows ARM device is slow. (UWP, Xamarin.Forms)
body:
Hello,
I'm developing a UWP application with Xamarin.Forms.
Drawing lines using SKBlendMode.DstOver on Windows ARM devices is very slow.

But when I run "x64" built app on an Windows ARM device it works fine.

Information:
* SkiaSharp.Views.Forms Version : 2.88.3
* IDE : Visual Studio 2022 Version 17.4.1

Why does this issue occur?
